title: Cocktail Finder
description: A playful, API-powered cocktail explorer that combines a random generator with full search capabilities. Built with accessible, responsive UI patterns and persistent favoriting using localStorage. Designed to feel smooth, intuitive, and fun while demonstrating strong JavaScript and front-end fundamentals.

title: Washington State Website
description: A responsive multi-page website built with semantic HTML, modern CSS (Flexbox/Grid), and lightweight JavaScript. Focuses on readability, structure, and accessibility—showcasing clean front-end engineering practices and thoughtful content organization.

title: Dear Self
description: A gentle, customizable journaling application built in React with a focus on calm UX, theming, and private local data. Uses component-driven design, state management, and routing to create an experience that feels supportive, personal, and intuitive for daily use.

title: API Testing Suite – TheCocktailDB
description: An automated, data-driven API regression suite for TheCocktailDB using Postman and Newman. Covers key endpoints with schema-style response validation, HTML reporting, and GitHub Actions CI.
